named-query.name: GameLog.findPlayerStatDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.PlayerStatDto( gl.playerId, gl.seasonStartYear, gl.lastName, gl.firstName, gl.incognito, COUNT(DISTINCT gl.gameId), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.hasPlayed = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.starter = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(gl.threePointersMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsAttempted), SUM(gl.personalFouls), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.personalFouls >= 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(gl.points), MAX(gl.points), MIN(gl.points) ) FROM GameLog gl WHERE gl.roundId = :roundId AND gl.groupCode = :groupCode AND gl.playerId IN :playerIds GROUP BY gl.playerId, gl.seasonStartYear, gl.lastName, gl.firstName, gl.incognito ORDER BY SUM(CASE WHEN gl.starter = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DESC, COUNT(DISTINCT gl.gameId) DESC, SUM(gl.points) DESC, gl.lastName, gl.firstName

named-query.name: GameLog.findPlayerStatRosterDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.PlayerStatDto( gl.playerId, gl.seasonStartYear, gl.lastName, gl.firstName, gl.incognito, COUNT(DISTINCT gl.gameId), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.hasPlayed = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.starter = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(gl.threePointersMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsAttempted), SUM(gl.personalFouls), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.personalFouls >= 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(gl.points), MAX(gl.points), MIN(gl.points) ) FROM GameLog gl WHERE gl.roundId = :roundId AND gl.groupCode = :groupCode AND gl.rosterId IN :rosterIds GROUP BY gl.playerId, gl.seasonStartYear, gl.lastName, gl.firstName, gl.incognito ORDER BY SUM(CASE WHEN gl.starter = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) DESC, COUNT(DISTINCT gl.gameId) DESC, SUM(gl.points) DESC, gl.lastName, gl.firstName

named-query.name: GameLog.findPlayerStatRosterTotalDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.PlayerStatDto( 0, 0, '', '', FALSE, COUNT(DISTINCT gl.gameId), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.hasPlayed = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.starter = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(gl.threePointersMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsAttempted), SUM(gl.personalFouls), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.personalFouls >= 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(gl.points), MAX(gl.points), MIN(gl.points) ) FROM GameLog gl WHERE gl.roundId = :roundId AND gl.groupCode = :groupCode AND gl.rosterId IN :rosterIds GROUP BY gl.rosterId

named-query.name: GameLog.findPlayerStatGroupTotalDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.PlayerStatDto( 0, 0, '', '', FALSE, COUNT(DISTINCT gl.gameId), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.hasPlayed = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.starter = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(gl.threePointersMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsAttempted), SUM(gl.personalFouls), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.personalFouls >= 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(gl.points), MAX(gl.points), MIN(gl.points) ) FROM GameLog gl WHERE gl.roundId = :roundId AND gl.groupCode = :groupCode AND gl.rosterId IN :rosterIds GROUP BY gl.roundId, gl.groupCode

named-query.name: GameLog.findTeamStatDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.TeamStatDto( gl.rosterId, gl.clubName, gl.clubCode, gl.teamOrdinalNbr, COUNT(DISTINCT gl.gameId), SUM(gl.threePointersMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsAttempted), SUM(gl.personalFouls), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.personalFouls >= 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(gl.points) ) FROM GameLog gl WHERE gl.roundId = :roundId AND gl.groupCode = :groupCode GROUP BY gl.rosterId, gl.clubCode, gl.clubName, gl.teamOrdinalNbr ORDER BY SUM(gl.points) DESC, gl.clubName

named-query.name: GameLog.findTeamStatGroupTotalDtos
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.dto.TeamStatDto( 0, '', '', 0, COUNT(DISTINCT gl.gameId), SUM(gl.threePointersMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsMade), SUM(gl.freeThrowsAttempted), SUM(gl.personalFouls), SUM(CASE WHEN gl.personalFouls >= 5 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), SUM(gl.points) ) FROM GameLog gl WHERE gl.roundId = :roundId AND gl.groupCode = :groupCode GROUP BY gl.roundId, gl.groupCode

named-query.name: GameLog.findByGroupAndPlayers
named-query.query: SELECT NEW io.kawoolutions.bbstats.entity.GameLog( gl.gameId, gl.home, gl.playerId, gl.rosterId, gl.seasonStartYear, gl.tipoff, gl.scheduledTipoff, gl.gameMatchdayNbr, gl.gameOfficialNbr, gl.clubName, gl.clubCode, gl.teamOrdinalNbr, gl.finalScore, gl.opponentRosterId, gl.opponentClubName, gl.opponentClubCode, gl.opponentTeamOrdinalNbr, gl.opponentFinalScore, gl.roundId, gl.groupCode, gl.competitionType, gl.invalid, gl.withdrawn, gl.lastName, gl.firstName, gl.incognito, gl.jerseyNbr, gl.hasPlayed, gl.starter, gl.fieldGoalsMade, gl.twoPointersMade, gl.threePointersMade, gl.freeThrowsMade, gl.freeThrowsAttempted, gl.freeThrowPercentage, gl.personalFouls, gl.points ) FROM GameLog gl WHERE gl.roundId = :roundId AND gl.groupCode = :groupCode AND gl.playerId IN :playerIds ORDER BY gl.lastName, gl.firstName, gl.tipoff DESC
